    Get color palette

    get_palette.Rd

    Get a vector of hexadecimal color codes based on the specified palette.

    Usage

    get_palette(palette, n = 9, direction = 1)

    Arguments

    palette

    A function that returns a color palette, a vector of hexadecimal color codes, the name of a palette from "RColorBrewer" or "viridis", or one of the package's palette functions.

    n

    Number of colors to return. Default is 9.

    direction

    Direction of the palette vector (1 for forward, -1 for reverse).

    Value

    A vector of hexadecimal color codes.

    Examples

    if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Using a predefined package palette function
colors <- get_palette(pal_kelly_20, n = 5)

# Using a palette directly  
colors <- get_palette(pal_kelly_20(), n = 5)

# Using a viridis palette name
colors <- get_palette("viridis", n = 10)

# Using a ColorBrewer palette name
colors <- get_palette("Blues", n = 7)

# Reverse direction
colors <- get_palette(pal_kelly_20, direction = -1)
} # }
